tool.name: utils.masks
tool.description: Make an array in which rows store 1d mask arrays from list of index lists.

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc
sc.utils.masks( n = '$n',)

tool.help:
Make an array in which rows store 1d mask arrays from list of index lists.
Parameters ---------- n : int Maximal index / number of samples.
